name: Tequila: El Diablo
description: Crème de cassis is a deep red liqueur made from black currants, and it gives this drink its reddish color. The ginger beer makes this drink bubbly and refreshing, the perfect sip on a warm evening.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lots of ice, the tequila, triple sec and lime juice in a mixing glass and shake. Add 1 1/2 tablespoons crème de cassis. Shake and strain into a glass with ice and top with ginger beer. Garnish: lemon wedge.
